source_objects.description: Need to learn marketing? Start with courese that introduce you to market research, marketing fundementals and more.
source_objects.title: Marketing Fundamentals

items.title: Marketing for Startups and Small Businesses
items.headline: A crash course to build your marketing strategy. Filled with quick, actionable tips.
objectives_summary: Understand the basics of Marketing for small businesses and startups

items.title: Real World, NO BS, Marketing Strategies for Photographers
items.headline: The NO SPIN, Take Your "Secrets" and Shove 'Em Marketing Strategies For Photographers
objectives_summary: At the end of this course you will have created your own marketing strategy as well as implementation planning
Students will have a strong working knowledge of portfolio design, and how to put together a portfolio that works
Photographers will understand how to use the tools at hand for maximum effect, and which tools will work for them

items.title: Basics of Facebook Marketing
items.headline: Know the Fundamentals of Facebook Platform
objectives_summary: Desire to know about Facebook Marketing
Understand the importance of marketing on Facebook

items.title: Email Marketing For Bloggers: Setting Up & Using ConvertKit
items.headline: Start building your email list with ConvertKit
objectives_summary: Understand if ConvertKit is right for them
See how to build forms and sequences with ConvertKit
See how to integrate landing page software with ConvertKit

items.title: The Essential, Step-by-Step Guide to Online Marketing

visible_instructors.job_title: Executive Coach: Launch Your Profitable Online Course
visible_instructors.title: Basim Salim
visible_instructors.name: Basim

items.headline: A comprehensive beginner's guide to successfully take your current business online to generate leads and profits.
objectives_summary: Get a higher level perspective of the ins-and-outs of online marketing as we know it today in 2016.
Learn the various ways you can generate traffic online through content marketing, SEO, social media and paid advertising
How to generate leads through lead magnets, call – to – actions and landing page.

items.title: Internet Business Secrets. Shhhhh !
items.headline: Learn some of the craziest internet business shortcuts and hacks which will help you to make bucket loads of money.
objectives_summary: Understand the core of building a business
Get the exact blueprint to start an online business
have the right mindset to build an online business

items.title: Marketing 101: The Principles of Marketing
items.headline: An introduction to modern marketing in a nutshell. Based on Kotler and Armstrong's "Principles of Marketing"
objectives_summary: Understanding the Marketplace and Customer
Create a value-driven marketing strategy
Construct a marketing program

items.title: Email Marketing: Ultimate Tutorial To Using Drip Marketing!
items.headline: Learn How To Use Drip Email Marketing To Create Your Fully Optimised Email Marketing Operations!
objectives_summary: Email Marketing
Drip Email Marketing
Understand How To Get Started With Email Marketing

items.headline: Learn the fundamentals of email and how to create successful campaigns
objectives_summary: Fundamentals and benefits of using Email as a marketing channel
Understand the difference between different types of email campaigns and communications
Plan and create successful email campaigns

visible_instructors.job_title: Get some education, not just schooling!

items.headline: Marketing is not magic, its a skill!
objectives_summary: Conceptualize, Understand and Setup a high-level Marketing framework. be able to put a basic marketing plan together

items.title: Marketing Basics
items.headline: Marketing is vital throughout a business to give you direction, to help you to set goals and objectives to succeed
objectives_summary: Understand proven basic practices in Customer Marketing

items.title: Marketing Psychology: How to Get People to Buy More & Fast!

visible_instructors.name: Basim
visible_instructors.title: Basim Salim
visible_instructors.job_title: Executive Coach: Launch Your Profitable Online Course

items.headline: Learn a set of “persuasion & influence tools” you can use to ethically motivate people to action in marketing & business
objectives_summary: Create marketing that grabs your customer’s attention, triggers curiosity and interest in your product, and ultimately persuades them to take action and BUY from you.
The psychology of capturing attention, and how to get people to think and dream about your brand.
My exact recommendations on how to price, package, & position your product, including the psychology of premium pricing (something that took me years to learn)

items.title: Learn Marketing- Time to be Pro in Sales and Marketing
items.headline: Guide to lean Sales Process, Prospecting, Lead Generation & Sales Approach to overrule your competition
objectives_summary: Learn the 7 Steps in SALES PROCESS using the leading edge sales strategies.
How to SOURCE LEADS and identify the different source for leads for FREE.
The MOST EFFECTIVE Marketing techniques to capture your audience’s attention and convert them into SALES.

items.title: 6 ways to generate leads starting from zero + FREE templates
items.headline: Learn how you can get your first leads and email contacts for your business using lead magnet and landing page
objectives_summary: You will learn what a landing page and a lead magnet are
You will be able to design your own landing page or use my free templates
By the end of the course, you will know several strategies to get emails and create a mailing list for your business

items.title: Learn to Make Sales Videos on a Shoestring in under 1 Hour
items.headline: Learn to make your own Explainer Videos with free or very low cost stuff. Boost your bottom line and brand awareness.
objectives_summary: Produce high quality, low cost videos for your business.
